'''Minty Fruit Tea''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Minty Fruit Tea is obtained from the [[Mail/New Recipe Rewards (2023-04-03)|New Recipe Rewards]] mail.

Depending on the quality, Minty Fruit Tea increases the party's defense by '''165'''/'''200'''/'''235''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
